member.summary: Gets or sets whether the container enables the user to scroll to any controls placed outside of its visible boundaries.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether the form will automatically resize itself.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether window panning is allowed.

member.summary: Gets and sets the zoom value.

member.summary: Gets and sets zoom to fit value

member.name: P:Neurotec.Gui.NView.CanPan
member.summary: Derived class sets CanPan when it does not want to do anything on mouse down event. When it is set, NView can provide automatic panning.

member.name: P:Neurotec.Gui.NView.IsPanning
member.summary: If derived class set CanPan to true, it must check IsPanning in all mouse events handlers and don't do anything if IsPanning is true.
